column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The modern art exhibits here are where they really shine as this museum was the only US art museum to host the 1913 Armory Show
column2: which put many cutting edge European artists on the map like Duchamp
column8: Seurat et al. Many of which went on to be considered masters of their time. Today
column9: this museum showcases outstanding pieces of their work picking out just a couple of pieces in some cases that show the breadth of the artist's work over time.
